user.title: Setup Osservaprezzi Carburanti
user.description:
Enter the station ID to monitor fuel prices.

How to find ID:
1. Go to carburanti.mise.gov.it/ospzSearch/zona
2. Search and click your station
3. Copy ID from URL (e.g: 1111 from .../dettaglio/1111)
